Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal document. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Writing on verso (across fibres) only, 3 ll. Contents. Receipt given by Thotortais son of Petechons to Amenhotep son of Paret for 2 1/2 kite. Date. year 14 Mesore, Ptol. early? Origin. Thebes".
Production date: 3rdC BC ((early Ptolemaic date suggested by Thomspon's MS Catalogue))
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Thebes (historic - Upper Egypt) ((site suggested by Thompson's MS Catalogue))
Curator's comments: Thompson MS: "Publ. Reich u.s. p.82, pl. X" Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT.
Bibliographic references: Reich 1914 / Papyri juistischen Inhalts in hieratischer und demotischer Schrift aus dem British Museum (p.82-3, pl.10)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (46060) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/46060)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: loss Black ink Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: good
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir John Gardner Wilkinson
